特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
This course will be conducted mainly face-to-face, but some of the classes may be conducted online (simultaneous or on demand), depending on the coronavirus situation, and the pace of the course.

(Information ONLY for students permitted to take classes online: Where necessary and only for students permitted to take classes online the university will provide the means to participate in the classes on the day and time scheduled simultaneously via Zoom through a two-way online broadcast.)

General course format:
This is NOT a lecture class. Lessons are highly student-centered involving individual, pair, and group work. Students are expected to actively contribute to the class, as well as complete their assignments in a timely manner before each class.

第1回:
All 14 lessons are conducted face to face.
Week 1: Introductions and course overview
トピック.授業計画1: Please note that the weekly schedule above is for information purposes and may change throughout the semester. Any change will be announced to students.
トピック.授業外学習2: Review each lesson and complete the regular homework assignments in order to be prepared for the following class.  This should take approximately two hours per class lesson.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: 30% participation and completion of assignments; 40% skills assessment; 30% Final test

name: 【250】Skills-based English(IELTS)　４／Skills-based English(IELTS)
